meanings.definition: A person who writes or gives opinions in an editorial.
meanings.sent1: The editorializers at the newspaper shared their views on the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: The editorializers often provide insightful perspectives on current events.
meanings.sent3: The editorializers decided to have a friendly debate about the best pizza toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her father was the editorializer of the family, always sharing his thoughts on various topics.
meanings.sent5: The group of editorializers gathered to discuss the latest environmental issues.

meanings.definition: To express opinions or give commentary in an editorial.
meanings.sent1: She editorializers about social issues in her blog regularly.
meanings.sent2: It is important for journalists to editorialize responsibly.
meanings.sent3: The cat editorializers loudly about the lack of treats in its bowl.
meanings.sent4: His words editorialize the importance of kindness in everyday interactions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged the students to editorialize on the impact of technology on society.
